Parse an R Markdown or Quarto document

Source: R/parse_rmd.R
parse_rmd.Rd

Documents are parsed into an rmd_ast object.

Usage

parse_rmd(rmd)

parse_qmd(qmd)

Arguments

rmd

Either the path to an Rmd file or a character vector containing the contents of a R Markdown document.

qmd

Either the path to an qmd file or a character vector containing the contents of a Quarto document.

Value

Returns a rmd_ast object.

Examples

parse_rmd(system.file("examples/hw01.Rmd", package="parsermd"))
#> ├── YAML [2 fields]
#> ├── Heading [h3] - Load packages
#> │   └── Chunk [r, 2 lines] - load-packages
#> ├── Heading [h3] - Exercise 1
#> │   ├── Markdown [1 line]
#> │   └── Heading [h4] - Solution
#> │       └── Markdown [1 line]
#> ├── Heading [h3] - Exercise 2
#> │   ├── Markdown [1 line]
#> │   └── Heading [h4] - Solution
#> │       ├── Markdown [3 lines]
#> │       ├── Chunk [r, 5 lines] - plot-dino
#> │       ├── Markdown [1 line]
#> │       └── Chunk [r, 2 lines] - cor-dino
#> └── Heading [h3] - Exercise 3
#>     ├── Markdown [1 line]
#>     └── Heading [h4] - Solution
#>         ├── Markdown [3 lines]
#>         ├── Chunk [r, 1 line] - plot-star
#>         ├── Markdown [1 line]
#>         └── Chunk [r, 1 line] - cor-star
